title: Candidates for: Battlecast
body:
Ok so considering that the first post in this series did fairly well (also ironic that it was about PROJECT and then we get a teaser for more skins for it now), I feel it's safe(ish) to say that this has gotten off to a great start and I will be continuing it until I run out of topics until the next series pops up. And with that said, I think the best way to start the second discussion of the series is to do the complementary anti-series that is tied with the PROJECT series: Battlecast!

Now Battlecast by far is one of my favorite series Riot has done. There's just something that really gets me excited about having these champs turn into machines of a dystopian world, helbent on removing all organic life (AND THIS ISN'T TO BE CONFUSED WITH MECHA, THAT IS A DIFFERENT ROBOT THEME THAT I MAY GET TOO NEXT TIME!). 

Like before, the current editions to the series are {{champion:31}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:161}}  and Creator {{champion:112}} . Now the reason I bring up the current roster is to 1. remind everyone who is already in the series & 2. give an understanding of what choices there are for champs to be added in. 

From the list, you can quickly tell that some of the candidates are Void Creatures but at the same time it's not strictly retained to Void creatures as we have Skarner, Xerath and even two humans (well...kinda humans since they're part machine). Nevertheless, this does allow some open space as to who could be added in the series.

Now just to get it right out, there is the voting for the next {{champion:420}} skin (hurray!) as to what it should be next and Battlecast/battlecast-type skin is a concept but not fully guaranteed. I would be fine if she got all of those concepts done eventually, but as it stands it's up to the people and we just have to wait and hear.

With that out of the way, it now comes down to my ideas. For me, it's actually kinda hard since there aren't a lot of monster champs and some have gotten robot skins outside of Battlecast already, but some candidates I feel could work are {{champion:90}} {{champion:34}} (since there's that stealth bomber hidden concept a while ago or something) {{champion:120}} {{champion:141}} (Rhaast form in contrast to PROJECT Kayn form) {{champion:19}}  and possibly {{champion:53}} .

Anyways that my list of ideas but what are yours? Who do you feel are clarified as candidates for Battlecast?

replies.body:
For me it goes after the shapes of their bodies.

Battlecast: Monsters, hardly resembling a human. An alien silhouette. (Xeraths skin was very early in the line and isn't really that close to other Battlecast skins)
Mecha: Brutes. Giant, bulky humanoid silhouette.
Project: "Normal" humans.

Then we have outliers like Program, that aren't brutes, but don't have the most human silhouette either.

Keep in mind that the name isn't final and the skin might end up with a different one.
After all the skin depicts her as someone who fights against the battlecast and not someone who is a battlecast robot herself.
A reason why I don't like the skin
Project Shenpai to counter his evil former kouhai. But I'll settle for battlecast or mecha.

My candidates for the next cast of the battle:
{{champion:120}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:29}}

I'm still hoping for Battlecast Zac.  Suggested it way back in the day and had a few people interested in it at the time.  Others that haven't been brought up might also include Alistar, Tham Kench and maybe Trundle.
